name: Imaginnovate
tagline: Innovation partner for your digital dreams
description:
Imaginnovate is an innovation partner for your digital dreams. We deliver high quality mobile applications and we take pride in delivering pixel perfect apps. Our teams are highly agile and adapt to changes at the speed of need. 
At Imaginnovate, we have teams to work on your product at any stage. Our teams work with you from idea to product delivery and beyond with maintenance and support services. We are your technology partner so that you can focus more on your core business.
